In the summer and winter tourist seasons there are buses between Going, Stanglwirt, Scheffau am Wilden Kaiser, Blaiken and Söll (Hohe Salve) for skiers or summer hikers. SkiWelt

(+43 5333 400) operates a Skibus through the region.

Ellmau is accessible from Innsbruck and Salzburg via taxi. Munich offers car hire service.

Having a car gives the advantage of being able to travel around freely. 

There are many bus services running throughout the area.
